data.host: MSME, Govt. of India and National Research Development Corporation (NRDC)
data.name: How MSMEs can innovate and lead India into a green future?
data.summary:
How MSMEs can innovate and lead India into a green future'?

The event would be a premium forum which would bring together thought leaders from MSME industry, Green tech innovations and IP domain to discuss how the strategic use of IP rights can also help in reaching a sustainable green future.
data.speakers:
Ms. Mandeep Kaur, IAS, Joint Development Commissioner, M/o MSME, Govt. of India
Dr. H. Purushotham, Chairman & MD, National Research Development Corporation (NRDC)
Mr. Vivek Singh, Head - IP Drafting, Filing & Prosecution, Sagacious IP
Mr. Joel Fernandes, Project Lead, Europe, Business Support to the EU-India Policy Dialogues
Mr. Faiz Wahid, Regional Head - Europe, Sagacious IP
Mr. Alok Patnia, Managing Partner & Founder, Taxmantra
Mr. Anil Joshi, Founder and Managing Partner,Unicorn India Ventures
